[Sun Apr 19 13:25:44 2020] INF: [bufferObject.cpp (41)] Buffer object 14 ha reservado 368 bytes
[Sun Apr 19 13:25:44 2020] INF: [glMatrices.cpp (160)] UBO GLMatrices creado
[Sun Apr 19 13:25:44 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.vert
[Sun Apr 19 13:25:44 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Sun Apr 19 13:25:44 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Sun Apr 19 13:25:44 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(28) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting "::" at token "("

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 4) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderAxis;
 18 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 19 |
 20 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 21 |uniform float box_X;
 22 |uniform float box_Z;
 23 |uniform float box_Y;
 24 |uniform vec3 boxAxis;
 25 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 26 |
 27 |//uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 28 |uniform (layout = 21) float memb01;
 29 |uniform (layout = 22) float memb02;
 30 |uniform (layout = 23) float memb03;
 31 |uniform (layout = 24) float memb04;
 32 |uniform (layout = 25) float memb05;
 33 |uniform (layout = 26) float memb06;
 34 |uniform (layout = 27) float memb07;
 35 |uniform (layout = 28) float memb08;
 36 |uniform (layout = 29) float memb09;
 37 |
 38 |in vec4 color[3];
 39 |out vec4 fragColor;
 40 |
 41 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 42 |{
 43 |	int count = 0;
 44 |	vec3 p1 = cylinderPos;
 45 |	vec3 p2 = cylinderPos + cylinderAxis*cylinderHeight;
 46 |	vec3 vec = p2-p1;
 47 |	if (dot(q-p1,vec)>=0&&dot(q-p2,vec)<=0)
 48 |	{
 49 |		float rValue = cylinderRadius * length(vec);
 50 |		float crossValue = length(cross(q-p1,vec));
 51 |		count = crossValue<=rValue?1:0;
 52 |	}
 53 |	return count;
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 57 |{
 58 |	vec3 t = boxAxis;
 59 |	float yp1 = t.y+1.0f;
 60 |	mat3 fix = mat3
 61 |	(
 62 |    t.y + (t.z * t.z / yp1), -t.x, -t.z * t.x / yp1, 
 63 |    t.x, t.y, t.z, 
 64 |    -t.z*t.x / yp1, -t.z, t.y + (t.x*t.x / yp1));
 65 |	//fix = boxMatPass;
 66 |	fix = mat3(
 67 |	memb01,memb02,memb03,
 68 |	memb04,memb05,memb06,
 69 |	memb07,memb08,memb09
 70 |	);
 71 |
 72 |	vec3 inv = transpose(fix) * (q - boxPos);
 73 |
 74 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 75 |		return 1;
 76 |return 0;
 77 |	}
 78 |
 79 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 80 |{
 81 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 82 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 83 |	return 0;
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 89 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 90 |	{
 91 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 92 |	}
 93 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 94 |	{
 95 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 96 |		vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 98 |		{
 99 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
100 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
101 |			{
102 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
103 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
104 |			}
105 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
106 |			EmitVertex();
107 |		}
108 |		EndPrimitive();
109 |	}
110 |}

[Sun Apr 19 13:31:04 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(28) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting "::" at token "("

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 4) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderAxis;
 18 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 19 |
 20 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 21 |uniform float box_X;
 22 |uniform float box_Z;
 23 |uniform float box_Y;
 24 |uniform vec3 boxAxis;
 25 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 26 |
 27 |//uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 28 |uniform (layout = 21) in float memb01;
 29 |uniform (layout = 22) in float memb02;
 30 |uniform (layout = 23) in float memb03;
 31 |uniform (layout = 24) in float memb04;
 32 |uniform (layout = 25) in float memb05;
 33 |uniform (layout = 26) in float memb06;
 34 |uniform (layout = 27) in float memb07;
 35 |uniform (layout = 28) in float memb08;
 36 |uniform (layout = 29) in float memb09;
 37 |
 38 |in vec4 color[3];
 39 |out vec4 fragColor;
 40 |
 41 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 42 |{
 43 |	int count = 0;
 44 |	vec3 p1 = cylinderPos;
 45 |	vec3 p2 = cylinderPos + cylinderAxis*cylinderHeight;
 46 |	vec3 vec = p2-p1;
 47 |	if (dot(q-p1,vec)>=0&&dot(q-p2,vec)<=0)
 48 |	{
 49 |		float rValue = cylinderRadius * length(vec);
 50 |		float crossValue = length(cross(q-p1,vec));
 51 |		count = crossValue<=rValue?1:0;
 52 |	}
 53 |	return count;
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 57 |{
 58 |	vec3 t = boxAxis;
 59 |	float yp1 = t.y+1.0f;
 60 |	mat3 fix = mat3
 61 |	(
 62 |    t.y + (t.z * t.z / yp1), -t.x, -t.z * t.x / yp1, 
 63 |    t.x, t.y, t.z, 
 64 |    -t.z*t.x / yp1, -t.z, t.y + (t.x*t.x / yp1));
 65 |	//fix = boxMatPass;
 66 |	fix = mat3(
 67 |	memb01,memb02,memb03,
 68 |	memb04,memb05,memb06,
 69 |	memb07,memb08,memb09
 70 |	);
 71 |
 72 |	vec3 inv = transpose(fix) * (q - boxPos);
 73 |
 74 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 75 |		return 1;
 76 |return 0;
 77 |	}
 78 |
 79 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 80 |{
 81 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 82 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 83 |	return 0;
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 89 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 90 |	{
 91 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 92 |	}
 93 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 94 |	{
 95 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 96 |		vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 98 |		{
 99 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
100 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
101 |			{
102 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
103 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
104 |			}
105 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
106 |			EmitVertex();
107 |		}
108 |		EndPrimitive();
109 |	}
110 |}

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 4) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderAxis;
 18 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 19 |
 20 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 21 |uniform float box_X;
 22 |uniform float box_Z;
 23 |uniform float box_Y;
 24 |uniform vec3 boxAxis;
 25 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 26 |
 27 |//uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 28 |layout (layout = 21) uniform float memb01;
 29 |layout (layout = 22) uniform float memb02;
 30 |layout (layout = 23) uniform float memb03;
 31 |layout (layout = 24) uniform float memb04;
 32 |layout (layout = 25) uniform float memb05;
 33 |layout (layout = 26) uniform float memb06;
 34 |layout (layout = 27) uniform float memb07;
 35 |layout (layout = 28) uniform float memb08;
 36 |layout (layout = 29) uniform float memb09;
 37 |
 38 |in vec4 color[3];
 39 |out vec4 fragColor;
 40 |
 41 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 42 |{
 43 |	int count = 0;
 44 |	vec3 p1 = cylinderPos;
 45 |	vec3 p2 = cylinderPos + cylinderAxis*cylinderHeight;
 46 |	vec3 vec = p2-p1;
 47 |	if (dot(q-p1,vec)>=0&&dot(q-p2,vec)<=0)
 48 |	{
 49 |		float rValue = cylinderRadius * length(vec);
 50 |		float crossValue = length(cross(q-p1,vec));
 51 |		count = crossValue<=rValue?1:0;
 52 |	}
 53 |	return count;
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 57 |{
 58 |	vec3 t = boxAxis;
 59 |	float yp1 = t.y+1.0f;
 60 |	mat3 fix = mat3
 61 |	(
 62 |    t.y + (t.z * t.z / yp1), -t.x, -t.z * t.x / yp1, 
 63 |    t.x, t.y, t.z, 
 64 |    -t.z*t.x / yp1, -t.z, t.y + (t.x*t.x / yp1));
 65 |	//fix = boxMatPass;
 66 |	fix = mat3(
 67 |	memb01,memb02,memb03,
 68 |	memb04,memb05,memb06,
 69 |	memb07,memb08,memb09
 70 |	);
 71 |
 72 |	vec3 inv = transpose(fix) * (q - boxPos);
 73 |
 74 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 75 |		return 1;
 76 |return 0;
 77 |	}
 78 |
 79 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 80 |{
 81 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 82 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 83 |	return 0;
 84 |}
 85 |
 86 |void main()
 87 |{
 88 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 89 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 90 |	{
 91 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 92 |	}
 93 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 94 |	{
 95 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 96 |		vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 98 |		{
 99 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
100 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
101 |			{
102 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
103 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
104 |			}
105 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
106 |			EmitVertex();
107 |		}
108 |		EndPrimitive();
109 |	}
110 |}

Vertex shader: ../p7/p7.vert
----------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |in vec3 position;
 13 |in vec3 normal;
 14 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 15 |
 16 |// Posición de la fuente en el espacio de la cámara
 17 |uniform vec3 lightpos;
 18 |// Color difuso del objeto
 19 |uniform vec4 diffuseColor;
 20 |
 21 |out mat3 boxMatPassV;
 22 |out vec4 color;
 23 |
 24 |void main() {
 25 |	// Normal en el espacio de la cámara
 26 |	vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix *normal);
 27 |	// Vértice en el espacio de la cámara
 28 |	vec4 pos4 = vec4(position, 1.0);
 29 |	vec3 eposition=vec3(modelviewMatrix * pos4);
 30 |	// Cálculo de la iluminación
 31 |	color = max(0.0, dot(eN, normalize(lightpos-eposition))) * diffuseColor;
 32 |	gl_Position = modelMatrix * pos4;
 33 |	boxMatPass = boxMatPassV;
 34 |}
 35 |

[Sun Apr 19 14:08:01 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Sun Apr 19 14:08:01 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Sun Apr 19 14:08:01 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(48) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected ';', expecting '{' at token ";"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 4) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderAxis;
 18 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 19 |
 20 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 21 |uniform float box_X;
 22 |uniform float box_Z;
 23 |uniform float box_Y;
 24 |uniform vec3 boxAxis;
 25 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 26 |
 27 |//uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 28 |layout (location = 21) uniform float memb01;
 29 |layout (location = 22) uniform float memb02;
 30 |layout (location = 23) uniform float memb03;
 31 |layout (location = 24) uniform float memb04;
 32 |layout (location = 25) uniform float memb05;
 33 |layout (location = 26) uniform float memb06;
 34 |layout (location = 27) uniform float memb07;
 35 |layout (location = 28) uniform float memb08;
 36 |layout (location = 29) uniform float memb09;
 37 |
 38 |uniform float xm01;
 39 |uniform float xm02;
 40 |uniform float xm03;
 41 |uniform float xm04;
 42 |uniform float xm05;
 43 |uniform float xm06;
 44 |uniform float xm07;
 45 |uniform float xm08;
 46 |uniform float xm09;
 47 |
 48 |in boxMatPassV;
 49 |in vec4 color[3];
 50 |out vec4 fragColor;
 51 |
 52 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 53 |{
 54 |	int count = 0;
 55 |	vec3 p1 = cylinderPos;
 56 |	vec3 p2 = cylinderPos + cylinderAxis*cylinderHeight;
 57 |	vec3 vec = p2-p1;
 58 |	if (dot(q-p1,vec)>=0&&dot(q-p2,vec)<=0)
 59 |	{
 60 |		float rValue = cylinderRadius * length(vec);
 61 |		float crossValue = length(cross(q-p1,vec));
 62 |		count = crossValue<=rValue?1:0;
 63 |	}
 64 |	return count;
 65 |}
 66 |
 67 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 68 |{
 69 |	vec3 t = boxAxis;
 70 |	float yp1 = t.y+1.0f;
 71 |	mat3 fix = mat3
 72 |	(
 73 |    t.y + (t.z * t.z / yp1), -t.x, -t.z * t.x / yp1, 
 74 |    t.x, t.y, t.z, 
 75 |    -t.z*t.x / yp1, -t.z, t.y + (t.x*t.x / yp1));
 76 |	//fix = boxMatPass;
 77 |	fix = boxMatPassV*fix;
 78 |	mat3 fix2 = mat3(
 79 |	memb01,memb02,memb03,
 80 |	memb04,memb05,memb06,
 81 |	memb07,memb08,memb09
 82 |	);
 83 |	//fix=fix2;
 84 |	mat3 fix3 = mat3(
 85 |	xm01,xm02,xm03,
 86 |	xm04,xm05,xm06,
 87 |	xm07,xm08,xm09
 88 |	);
 89 |	//fix=fix3;
 90 |
 91 |	vec3 inv = transpose(fix) * (q - boxPos);
 92 |
 93 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 94 |		return 1;
 95 |return 0;
 96 |	}
 97 |
 98 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 99 |{
100 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
101 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
102 |	return 0;
103 |}
104 |
105 |void main()
106 |{
107 |	int vertexCount = 0;
108 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
109 |	{
110 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
111 |	}
112 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
113 |	{
114 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
115 |		vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
116 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
117 |		{
118 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
119 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
120 |			{
121 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
122 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
123 |			}
124 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
125 |			EmitVertex();
126 |		}
127 |		EndPrimitive();
128 |	}
129 |}

[Mon Apr 20 23:23:35 2020] INF: [glMatrices.cpp (160)] UBO GLMatrices creado
[Mon Apr 20 23:23:35 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.vert
[Mon Apr 20 23:23:35 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Mon Apr 20 23:23:35 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Mon Apr 20 23:23:35 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(62) : error C7011: implicit cast from "int" to "bool"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount=3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 65 |		{
 66 |			vec4 move = vec4(-0.1f,0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 67 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 68 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 69 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 70 |			EmitVertex();
 71 |
 72 |			move = vec4(-0.1f,-0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 73 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 74 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 75 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 76 |			EmitVertex();
 77 |
 78 |			move = vec4(-0.1f,0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 79 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 80 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(0.1f,-0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 86 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 87 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 88 |			EmitVertex();
 89 |
 90 |			EndPrimitive();
 91 |		}
 92 |	}
 93 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 94 |	{
 95 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 96 |		{
 97 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 98 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 99 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
100 |			{
101 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
102 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
103 |			}
104 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
105 |			EmitVertex();
106 |		}
107 |		EndPrimitive();
108 |	}
109 |}

[Mon Apr 20 23:23:59 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Mon Apr 20 23:23:59 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(68) : error C1008: undefined variable "colorMask"
0(74) : error C1008: undefined variable "colorMask"
0(80) : error C1008: undefined variable "colorMask"
0(86) : error C1008: undefined variable "colorMask"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 65 |		{
 66 |			vec4 move = vec4(-0.1f,0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 67 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 68 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 69 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 70 |			EmitVertex();
 71 |
 72 |			move = vec4(-0.1f,-0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 73 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 74 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 75 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 76 |			EmitVertex();
 77 |
 78 |			move = vec4(-0.1f,0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 79 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 80 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(0.1f,-0.1f,0.0f,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 86 |			colorMask.xyz = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 87 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 88 |			EmitVertex();
 89 |
 90 |			EndPrimitive();
 91 |		}
 92 |	}
 93 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 94 |	{
 95 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 96 |		{
 97 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 98 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 99 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
100 |			{
101 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
102 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
103 |			}
104 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
105 |			EmitVertex();
106 |		}
107 |		EndPrimitive();
108 |	}
109 |}

  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |

 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 65 |		{
 66 |			float dist = 0.001f
 67 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 68 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 69 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 70 |			EmitVertex();
 71 |
 72 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 73 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 74 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 75 |			EmitVertex();
 76 |
 77 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 78 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 79 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 80 |			EmitVertex();
 81 |
 82 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 83 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 84 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 85 |			EmitVertex();
 86 |
 87 |			EndPrimitive();
 88 |		}
 89 |	}
 90 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 91 |	{
 92 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 93 |		{
 94 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 95 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 96 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 97 |			{
 98 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
 99 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
100 |			}
101 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
102 |			EmitVertex();
103 |		}
104 |		EndPrimitive();
105 |	}
106 |}

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 65 |		{
 66 |			float dist = 0.001f
 67 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 68 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 69 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 70 |			EmitVertex();
 71 |
 72 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 73 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 74 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 75 |			EmitVertex();
 76 |
 77 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 78 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 79 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 80 |			EmitVertex();
 81 |
 82 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 83 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 84 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 85 |			EmitVertex();
 86 |
 87 |			EndPrimitive();
 88 |		}
 89 |	}
 90 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 91 |	{
 92 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 93 |		{
 94 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 95 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 96 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 97 |			{
 98 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
 99 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
100 |			}
101 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
102 |			EmitVertex();
103 |		}
104 |		EndPrimitive();
105 |	}
106 |}

 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |

 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;

 60 |	}

 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)

 66 |			float dist = 0.001f
 67 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 68 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);

 70 |			EmitVertex();
 71 |
 72 |			move = vec4(-dist,-dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 73 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 74 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 75 |			EmitVertex();
 76 |
 77 |			move = vec4(-dist,dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 78 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);

 80 |			EmitVertex();

 82 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f,0.0f);

 85 |			EmitVertex();

 89 |	}

100 |			}

[Mon Apr 20 23:28:15 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.vert
[Mon Apr 20 23:28:15 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Mon Apr 20 23:28:15 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Mon Apr 20 23:28:15 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(82) : error C1068: too much data in type constructor

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 65 |		{
 66 |			float dist = 0.001f;
 67 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 68 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 69 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 70 |			EmitVertex();
 71 |
 72 |			move = vec4(-dist,-dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 73 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 74 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 75 |			EmitVertex();
 76 |
 77 |			move = vec4(-dist,dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 78 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 79 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 80 |			EmitVertex();
 81 |
 82 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f,0.0f);
 83 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 84 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 85 |			EmitVertex();
 86 |
 87 |			EndPrimitive();
 88 |		}
 89 |	}
 90 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 91 |	{
 92 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 93 |		{
 94 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 95 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 96 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 97 |			{
 98 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
 99 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
100 |			}
101 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
102 |			EmitVertex();
103 |		}
104 |		EndPrimitive();
105 |	}
106 |}

[Mon Apr 20 23:41:15 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Mon Apr 20 23:41:15 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Mon Apr 20 23:41:15 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(67) : error C1115: unable to find compatible overloaded function "normalize(vec3[3])"
0(70) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(75) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(80) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(85) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec3 normPass[3];
 29 |in vec4 color[3];
 30 |out vec4 fragColor;
 31 |
 32 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 33 |{
 34 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 35 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 36 |		return 1;
 37 |	return 0;
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 41 |{
 42 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 43 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 44 |		return 1;
 45 |	return 0;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 49 |{
 50 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 51 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 52 |	return 0;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main()
 56 |{
 57 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 58 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 59 |	{
 60 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 61 |	}
 62 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 63 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 64 |	{
 65 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 66 |		{
 67 |			vec4 gN = vec4(normalize(normPass),1.0f);
 68 |			float dist = 0.01f;
 69 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 70 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 71 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 72 |			EmitVertex();
 73 |
 74 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			EndPrimitive();
 90 |		}
 91 |	}
 92 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 93 |	{
 94 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 95 |		{
 96 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 98 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |			{
100 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
101 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
102 |			}
103 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
104 |			EmitVertex();
105 |		}
106 |		EndPrimitive();
107 |	}
108 |}

  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec3 normPass[3];
 29 |in vec4 color[3];
 30 |out vec4 fragColor;
 31 |
 32 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 33 |{
 34 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 35 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 36 |		return 1;
 37 |	return 0;
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 41 |{
 42 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 43 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 44 |		return 1;
 45 |	return 0;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 49 |{
 50 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 51 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 52 |	return 0;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main()
 56 |{
 57 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 58 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 59 |	{
 60 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 61 |	}
 62 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 63 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 64 |	{
 65 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 66 |		{
 67 |			vec4 gN = vec4(vec3(normalize(normPass)),1.0f);
 68 |			float dist = 0.01f;
 69 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 70 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 71 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 72 |			EmitVertex();
 73 |
 74 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			EndPrimitive();
 90 |		}
 91 |	}
 92 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 93 |	{
 94 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 95 |		{
 96 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 98 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |			{
100 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
101 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
102 |			}
103 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
104 |			EmitVertex();
105 |		}
106 |		EndPrimitive();
107 |	}
108 |}

[Mon Apr 20 23:43:13 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(67) : error C1115: unable to find compatible overloaded function "normalize(vec3[3])"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec3 normPass[3];
 29 |in vec4 color[3];
 30 |out vec4 fragColor;
 31 |
 32 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 33 |{
 34 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 35 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 36 |		return 1;
 37 |	return 0;
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 41 |{
 42 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 43 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 44 |		return 1;
 45 |	return 0;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 49 |{
 50 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 51 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 52 |	return 0;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main()
 56 |{
 57 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 58 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 59 |	{
 60 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 61 |	}
 62 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 63 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 64 |	{
 65 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 66 |		{
 67 |			vec3 gN = normalize(normPass);
 68 |			float dist = 0.01f;
 69 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 70 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 71 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 72 |			EmitVertex();
 73 |
 74 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * (gl_in[i].gl_Position + move);
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			EndPrimitive();
 90 |		}
 91 |	}
 92 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 93 |	{
 94 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 95 |		{
 96 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 98 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |			{
100 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
101 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
102 |			}
103 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
104 |			EmitVertex();
105 |		}
106 |		EndPrimitive();
107 |	}
108 |}

0(80) : error C7011: implicit cast from "vec4" to "vec3"
0(80) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(85) : error C7011: implicit cast from "vec4" to "vec3"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec3 normPass[3];
 29 |in vec4 color[3];
 30 |out vec4 fragColor;
 31 |
 32 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 33 |{
 34 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 35 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 36 |		return 1;
 37 |	return 0;
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 41 |{
 42 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 43 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 44 |		return 1;
 45 |	return 0;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 49 |{
 50 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 51 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 52 |	return 0;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main()
 56 |{
 57 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 58 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 59 |	{
 60 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 61 |	}
 62 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 63 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 64 |	{
 65 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 66 |		{
 67 |			vec3 gN = vec4(normalize(normPass[i]),1.0f);
 68 |			float dist = 0.01f;
 69 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 70 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 71 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 72 |			EmitVertex();
 73 |
 74 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			EndPrimitive();
 90 |		}
 91 |	}
 92 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 93 |	{
 94 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 95 |		{
 96 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 98 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |			{
100 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
101 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
102 |			}
103 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
104 |			EmitVertex();
105 |		}
106 |		EndPrimitive();
107 |	}
108 |}

 45 |	return 0;

 10 |};
 11 |

 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec3 normPass[3];
 29 |in vec4 color[3];
 30 |out vec4 fragColor;
 31 |
 32 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 33 |{
 34 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 35 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 36 |		return 1;
 37 |	return 0;
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 41 |{
 42 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 43 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 44 |		return 1;
 45 |	return 0;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 49 |{
 50 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 51 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 52 |	return 0;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main()
 56 |{
 57 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 58 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 59 |	{
 60 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 61 |	}
 62 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 63 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 64 |	{
 65 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 66 |		{
 67 |			vec3 gN = vec3(normalize(normPass[i]));
 68 |			float dist = 0.01f;
 69 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 70 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 71 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 72 |			EmitVertex();
 73 |
 74 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			EndPrimitive();
 90 |		}
 91 |	}
 92 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 93 |	{
 94 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 95 |		{
 96 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 98 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |			{
100 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
101 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
102 |			}
103 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
104 |			EmitVertex();
105 |		}
106 |		EndPrimitive();
107 |	}
108 |}

[Mon Apr 20 23:45:56 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Mon Apr 20 23:45:56 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Mon Apr 20 23:45:56 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(70) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(75) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(80) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(85) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 12) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec3 normPass[3];
 29 |in vec4 color[3];
 30 |out vec4 fragColor;
 31 |
 32 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 33 |{
 34 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 35 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 36 |		return 1;
 37 |	return 0;
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 41 |{
 42 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 43 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 44 |		return 1;
 45 |	return 0;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 49 |{
 50 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 51 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 52 |	return 0;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main()
 56 |{
 57 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 58 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 59 |	{
 60 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 61 |	}
 62 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 63 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 64 |	{
 65 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 66 |		{
 67 |			vec4 gN = vec4(normalize(normPass[i]),1.0f);
 68 |			float dist = 0.01f;
 69 |			vec4 move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 70 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 71 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 72 |			EmitVertex();
 73 |
 74 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			move = vec4(-dist,0.0f,dist,0.0f);
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			move = vec4(dist,0.0f,-dist,0.0f);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * dot(gN,(gl_in[i].gl_Position + move));
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			EndPrimitive();
 90 |		}
 91 |	}
 92 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 93 |	{
 94 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 95 |		{
 96 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
 97 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
 98 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |			{
100 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
101 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
102 |			}
103 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
104 |			EmitVertex();
105 |		}
106 |		EndPrimitive();
107 |	}
108 |}

[Tue Apr 21 00:30:53 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Tue Apr 21 00:30:53 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Tue Apr 21 00:30:53 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(67) : error C1068: array index out of bounds
0(67) : error C1068: array index out of bounds
0(67) : error C1068: array index out of bounds

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 65 |		{
 66 |			mat4 inv = inverse(viewMatrix);
 67 |			vec3 gCameraPos = vec3(inv[4][1],inv[4][3],inv[4][3]);
 68 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[0].gl_Position.xyz;
 69 |			vec3 toCamera = normalize(gCameraPos - Pos);
 70 |			vec3 up = vec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
 71 |			vec3 right = cross(toCamera, up);
 72 |
 73 |    Pos -= (right * 0.5);
 74 |    gl_Position = gVP * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 75 |    TexCoord = vec2(0.0, 0.0);
 76 |    EmitVertex();
 77 |
 78 |    Pos.y += 1.0;
 79 |    gl_Position = gVP * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 80 |    TexCoord = vec2(0.0, 1.0);
 81 |    EmitVertex();
 82 |
 83 |    Pos.y -= 1.0;
 84 |    Pos += right;
 85 |    gl_Position = gVP * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 86 |    TexCoord = vec2(1.0, 0.0);
 87 |    EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |    Pos.y += 1.0;
 90 |    gl_Position = gVP * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 91 |    TexCoord = vec2(1.0, 1.0);
 92 |    EmitVertex();
 93 |
 94 |			EndPrimitive();
 95 |		}
 96 |	}
 97 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 98 |	{
 99 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
100 |		{
101 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
102 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
103 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
104 |			{
105 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
106 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
107 |			}
108 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
109 |			EmitVertex();
110 |		}
111 |		EndPrimitive();
112 |	}
113 |}

 37 |}

 45 |}

 60 |	}

 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |			mat4 inv = inverse(viewMatrix);
 65 |			vec3 gCameraPos = vec3(inv[3][0],inv[3][1],inv[3][2]);
 66 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 67 |		{
 68 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 69 |			vec3 toCamera = normalize(gCameraPos - Pos);
 70 |			vec3 up = vec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
 71 |			vec3 right = cross(toCamera, up);
 72 |
 73 |    Pos -= (right * 0.5);
 74 |    gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 75 |    TexCoord = vec2(0.0, 0.0);
 76 |    EmitVertex();
 77 |
 78 |    Pos.y += 1.0;
 79 |    gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 80 |    TexCoord = vec2(0.0, 1.0);
 81 |    EmitVertex();
 82 |
 83 |    Pos.y -= 1.0;
 84 |    Pos += right;

 86 |    TexCoord = vec2(1.0, 0.0);
 87 |    EmitVertex();

[Tue Apr 21 00:33:08 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(75) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types
0(80) : error C1035: assignment of incompatible types

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |	{
 64 |			mat4 inv = inverse(viewMatrix);
 65 |			vec3 gCameraPos = vec3(inv[3][0],inv[3][1],inv[3][2]);
 66 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 67 |		{
 68 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 69 |			vec3 toCamera = normalize(gCameraPos - Pos);
 70 |			vec3 up = vec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
 71 |			vec3 right = cross(toCamera, up);
 72 |
 73 |    Pos -= (right * 0.5);
 74 |    gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 75 |    fragColor = vec2(0.0, 0.0);
 76 |    EmitVertex();
 77 |
 78 |    Pos.y += 1.0;
 79 |    gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 80 |    fragColor = vec2(0.0, 1.0);
 81 |    EmitVertex();
 82 |
 83 |    Pos.y -= 1.0;
 84 |    Pos += right;
 85 |    gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 86 |    fragColor = vec2(1.0, 0.0);
 87 |    EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |    Pos.y += 1.0;
 90 |    gl_Position = gVP * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 91 |    fragColor = vec2(1.0, 1.0);
 92 |    EmitVertex();
 93 |
 94 |			EndPrimitive();
 95 |		}
 96 |	}
 97 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 98 |	{
 99 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
100 |		{
101 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
102 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
103 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
104 |			{
105 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
106 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
107 |			}
108 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
109 |			EmitVertex();
110 |		}
111 |		EndPrimitive();
112 |	}
113 |}

 78 |    Pos.y += 1.0;

[Tue Apr 21 01:23:15 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(72) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '{', expecting "::" at token "{"
0(73) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '{', expecting "::" at token "{"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 62 |	{
 63 |	mat4 modelView = modelviewMatrix;
 64 |		float dist = 0.025f;
 65 |		  // First colunm.
 66 |  modelView[0][0] = 1.0; 
 67 |  modelView[0][1] = 0.0; 
 68 |  modelView[0][2] = 0.0; 
 69 |
 70 |  if (vertexCount==3)
 71 |  {
 72 |		CameraRight = {viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]}
 73 |		CameraUp = {viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]}
 74 |		float dist = 0.025f;
 75 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 76 |		{
 77 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 78 |			vec3 toCamera = normalize(gCameraPos - Pos);
 79 |			vec3 up = vec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
 80 |			vec3 right = cross(toCamera, up);
 81 |
 82 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
 83 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 84 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 85 |			EmitVertex();
 86 |
 87 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 88 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 89 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 90 |			EmitVertex();
 91 |
 92 |			Pos.y -= CameraUp*dist;
 93 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
 94 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 95 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 96 |			EmitVertex();
 97 |
 98 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 99 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
100 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
101 |			EmitVertex();
102 |
103 |			EndPrimitive();
104 |		}
105 |	}
106 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
107 |	{
108 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
109 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
110 |		{
111 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
112 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
113 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
114 |			{
115 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
116 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
117 |			}
118 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
119 |			EmitVertex();
120 |		}
121 |		EndPrimitive();
122 |	}
123 |}

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	if (vertexCount==3)
 62 |	{
 63 |	mat4 modelView = modelviewMatrix;
 64 |		float dist = 0.025f;
 65 |		  // First colunm.
 66 |  modelView[0][0] = 1.0; 
 67 |  modelView[0][1] = 0.0; 
 68 |  modelView[0][2] = 0.0; 
 69 |
 70 |  if (vertexCount==3)
 71 |  {
 72 |		vec3 CameraRight = vec3(viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]);
 73 |		vec3 CameraUp = vec3(viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]);
 74 |		float dist = 0.025f;
 75 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 76 |		{
 77 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 78 |			vec3 toCamera = normalize(gCameraPos - Pos);
 79 |			vec3 up = vec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
 80 |			vec3 right = cross(toCamera, up);
 81 |
 82 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
 83 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 84 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 85 |			EmitVertex();
 86 |
 87 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 88 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 89 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 90 |			EmitVertex();
 91 |
 92 |			Pos.y -= CameraUp*dist;
 93 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
 94 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 95 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 96 |			EmitVertex();
 97 |
 98 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 99 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
100 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
101 |			EmitVertex();
102 |
103 |			EndPrimitive();
104 |		}
105 |	}
106 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
107 |	{
108 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
109 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
110 |		{
111 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
112 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
113 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
114 |			{
115 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
116 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
117 |			}
118 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
119 |			EmitVertex();
120 |		}
121 |		EndPrimitive();
122 |	}
123 |}

[Tue Apr 21 01:24:42 2020] INF: [glMatrices.cpp (160)] UBO GLMatrices creado
[Tue Apr 21 01:24:42 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.vert
[Tue Apr 21 01:24:42 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Tue Apr 21 01:24:42 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Tue Apr 21 01:24:42 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(69) : error C1008: undefined variable "gCameraPos"
0(74) : error C1008: undefined variable "projviewMatrix"
0(79) : error C1008: undefined variable "projviewMatrix"
0(85) : error C1008: undefined variable "projviewMatrix"
0(90) : error C1008: undefined variable "projviewMatrix"

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |    if (vertexCount==3)
 62 |    {
 63 |		vec3 CameraRight = vec3(viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]);
 64 |		vec3 CameraUp = vec3(viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]);
 65 |		float dist = 0.025f;
 66 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 67 |		{
 68 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 69 |			vec3 toCamera = normalize(gCameraPos - Pos);
 70 |			vec3 up = vec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
 71 |			vec3 right = cross(toCamera, up);
 72 |
 73 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
 74 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 75 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 76 |			EmitVertex();
 77 |
 78 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 79 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 80 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 81 |			EmitVertex();
 82 |
 83 |			Pos.y -= CameraUp*dist;
 84 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
 85 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 86 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 87 |			EmitVertex();
 88 |
 89 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 90 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 91 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 92 |			EmitVertex();
 93 |
 94 |			EndPrimitive();
 95 |		}
 96 |	}
 97 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 98 |	{
 99 |		mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
100 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
101 |		{
102 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
103 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
104 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
105 |			{
106 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
107 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
108 |			}
109 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
110 |			EmitVertex();
111 |		}
112 |		EndPrimitive();
113 |	}
114 |}

Vertex shader: ../p7/p7.vert
----------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |in vec3 position;
 13 |in vec3 normal;
 14 |
 15 |// Posición de la fuente en el espacio de la cámara
 16 |uniform vec3 lightpos;
 17 |// Color difuso del objeto
 18 |uniform vec4 diffuseColor;
 19 |
 20 |out vec4 color;
 21 |
 22 |void main() {
 23 |	// Normal en el espacio de la cámara
 24 |	vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix *normal);
 25 |	// Vértice en el espacio de la cámara
 26 |	vec4 pos4 = vec4(position, 1.0);
 27 |	vec3 eposition=vec3(modelviewMatrix * pos4);
 28 |	// Cálculo de la iluminación
 29 |	color = max(0.0, dot(eN, normalize(lightpos-eposition))) * diffuseColor;
 30 |	gl_Position = modelMatrix * pos4;
 31 |}
 32 |
Fragment shader: ../p7/p7.frag
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |in vec4 fragColor;
  4 |
  5 |out vec4 finalColor;
  6 |
  7 |
  8 |void main()
  9 |{
 10 |	finalColor = fragColor;	
 11 |}

------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 20 |uniform float box_X;
 21 |uniform float box_Z;
 22 |uniform float box_Y;
 23 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 24 |
 25 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 26 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 27 |
 28 |in vec4 color[3];
 29 |out vec4 fragColor;
 30 |
 31 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 32 |{
 33 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 34 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 35 |		return 1;
 36 |	return 0;
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 40 |{
 41 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 42 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 43 |		return 1;
 44 |	return 0;
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 48 |{
 49 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 50 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 51 |	return 0;
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |void main()
 55 |{
 56 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 57 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 58 |	{
 59 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 60 |	}
 61 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 62 |    if (vertexCount==3)
 63 |    {
 64 |		vec3 CameraRight = vec3(viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]);
 65 |		vec3 CameraUp = vec3(viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]);
 66 |		float dist = 0.025f;
 67 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 68 |		{
 69 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 70 |
 71 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
 72 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 73 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 74 |			EmitVertex();
 75 |
 76 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 77 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 78 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 79 |			EmitVertex();
 80 |
 81 |			Pos.y -= CameraUp*dist;
 82 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
 83 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 84 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 85 |			EmitVertex();
 86 |
 87 |			Pos.y += CameraUp*dist;
 88 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 89 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 90 |			EmitVertex();
 91 |
 92 |			EndPrimitive();
 93 |		}
 94 |	}
 95 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 96 |	{
 97 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 98 |		{
 99 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
100 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
101 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
102 |			{
103 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
104 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
105 |			}
106 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
107 |			EmitVertex();
108 |		}
109 |		EndPrimitive();
110 |	}
111 |}
