[Tue Apr 21 19:28:07 2020] INF: [glMatrices.cpp (160)] UBO GLMatrices creado
[Tue Apr 21 19:28:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.vert
[Tue Apr 21 19:28:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.frag
[Tue Apr 21 19:28:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p7/p7.geom
[Tue Apr 21 19:28:07 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(14) : error C3008: unknown layout specifier 'gl_triangles_adjacency'

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |//layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |layout (GL_TRIANGLES_ADJACENCY, max_vertices = 6) out;
 15 |
 16 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 17 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 18 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 19 |
 20 |uniform bool quadrFlag;
 21 |uniform float dist;
 22 |
 23 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 24 |uniform float box_X;
 25 |uniform float box_Z;
 26 |uniform float box_Y;
 27 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 28 |
 29 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 30 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 31 |
 32 |in vec4 color[3];
 33 |out vec4 fragColor;
 34 |
 35 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 36 |{
 37 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 38 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 39 |		return 1;
 40 |	return 0;
 41 |}
 42 |
 43 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 44 |{
 45 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 46 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 47 |		return 1;
 48 |	return 0;
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 52 |{
 53 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 54 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 55 |	return 0;
 56 |}
 57 |
 58 |void main()
 59 |{
 60 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 61 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 62 |	{
 63 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 64 |	}
 65 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 66 |    if (vertexCount==3&&quadrFlag)
 67 |    {
 68 |		vec3 CameraRight = vec3(viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]);
 69 |		vec3 CameraUp = vec3(viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]);
 70 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 71 |		{
 72 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 73 |
 74 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			Pos += CameraUp*dist;
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			Pos -= CameraUp*dist;
 85 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
 86 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 87 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 88 |			EmitVertex();
 89 |
 90 |			Pos += CameraUp*dist;
 91 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 92 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 93 |			EmitVertex();
 94 |
 95 |			EndPrimitive();
 96 |		}
 97 |	}
 98 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
 99 |	{
100 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
101 |		{
102 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
103 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
104 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
105 |			{
106 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
107 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
108 |			}
109 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
110 |			EmitVertex();
111 |		}
112 |		EndPrimitive();
113 |	}
114 |}

Vertex shader: ../p7/p7.vert
----------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |in vec3 position;
 13 |in vec3 normal;
 14 |
 15 |// Posición de la fuente en el espacio de la cámara
 16 |uniform vec3 lightpos;
 17 |// Color difuso del objeto
 18 |uniform vec4 diffuseColor;
 19 |
 20 |out vec4 color;
 21 |out gN;
 22 |
 23 |void main() {
 24 |	// Normal en el espacio de la cámara
 25 |	vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix *normal);
 26 |	// Vértice en el espacio de la cámara
 27 |	vec4 pos4 = vec4(position, 1.0);
 28 |	vec3 eposition=vec3(modelviewMatrix * pos4);
 29 |	// Cálculo de la iluminación
 30 |	color = max(0.0, dot(eN, normalize(lightpos-eposition))) * diffuseColor;
 31 |	gN = eN;
 32 |	gl_Position = modelMatrix * pos4;
 33 |}
 34 |

Vertex shader: ../p7/p7.vert
----------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |in vec3 position;
 13 |in vec3 normal;
 14 |
 15 |// Posición de la fuente en el espacio de la cámara
 16 |uniform vec3 lightpos;
 17 |// Color difuso del objeto
 18 |uniform vec4 diffuseColor;
 19 |
 20 |out vec4 color;
 21 |out gN;
 22 |
 23 |void main() {
 24 |	// Normal en el espacio de la cámara
 25 |	vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix *normal);
 26 |	// Vértice en el espacio de la cámara
 27 |	vec4 pos4 = vec4(position, 1.0);
 28 |	vec3 eposition=vec3(modelviewMatrix * pos4);
 29 |	// Cálculo de la iluminación
 30 |	color = max(0.0, dot(eN, normalize(lightpos-eposition))) * diffuseColor;
 31 |	gN = eN;
 32 |	gl_Position = modelMatrix * pos4;
 33 |}
 34 |

Vertex shader: ../p7/p7.vert
----------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |in vec3 position;
 13 |in vec3 normal;
 14 |
 15 |// Posición de la fuente en el espacio de la cámara
 16 |uniform vec3 lightpos;
 17 |// Color difuso del objeto
 18 |uniform vec4 diffuseColor;
 19 |
 20 |out vec4 color;
 21 |out vec3 gN;
 22 |
 23 |void main() {
 24 |	// Normal en el espacio de la cámara
 25 |	vec3 eN = normalize(normalMatrix *normal);
 26 |	// Vértice en el espacio de la cámara
 27 |	vec4 pos4 = vec4(position, 1.0);
 28 |	vec3 eposition=vec3(modelviewMatrix * pos4);
 29 |	// Cálculo de la iluminación
 30 |	color = max(0.0, dot(eN, normalize(lightpos-eposition))) * diffuseColor;
 31 |	gN = eN;
 32 |	gl_Position = modelMatrix * pos4;
 33 |}

Geometry shader: ../p7/p7.geom
------------------------------
  1 |#version 450
  2 |
  3 |layout (std140, binding=0) uniform GLMatrices {
  4 |  mat4 modelMatrix;
  5 |  mat4 viewMatrix;
  6 |  mat4 projMatrix;
  7 |  mat4 modelviewMatrix;
  8 |  mat4 modelviewprojMatrix;
  9 |  mat3 normalMatrix;
 10 |};
 11 |
 12 |layout (triangles) in;
 13 |layout (triangle_strip, max_vertices = 6) out;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float cylinderRadius;
 16 |uniform float cylinderHeight;
 17 |uniform vec3 cylinderPos;
 18 |
 19 |uniform bool quadrFlag;
 20 |uniform float dist;
 21 |
 22 |uniform bool boxFlag;
 23 |uniform float box_X;
 24 |uniform float box_Z;
 25 |uniform float box_Y;
 26 |uniform vec3 boxPos;
 27 |
 28 |uniform mat3 boxMatPass;
 29 |uniform mat3 cylMatPass;
 30 |
 31 |in vec3 gN;
 32 |in vec4 color[3];
 33 |out vec4 fragColor;
 34 |
 35 |int isVertexInsideCyl(vec3 q)
 36 |{
 37 |	vec3 inv = transpose(cylMatPass) * (q - cylinderPos);
 38 |	if (0.0<=inv.y&&inv.y<=cylinderHeight&&(pow(inv.x,2)+pow(inv.z,2)<=pow(cylinderRadius,2)))
 39 |		return 1;
 40 |	return 0;
 41 |}
 42 |
 43 |int isVertexInsideBox(vec3 q)
 44 |{
 45 |	vec3 inv = transpose(boxMatPass) * (q - boxPos);
 46 |	if (abs(inv.x) < box_X * 0.5 && inv.y > 0 && inv.y < box_Y && abs(inv.z) < box_Z * 0.5)
 47 |		return 1;
 48 |	return 0;
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |int isVertexInside(vec3 q)
 52 |{
 53 |	if (!boxFlag) return isVertexInsideCyl(q);
 54 |	if (isVertexInsideCyl(q)==1||isVertexInsideBox(q)==1) return 1;
 55 |	return 0;
 56 |}
 57 |
 58 |void main()
 59 |{
 60 |	int vertexCount = 0;
 61 |	for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 62 |	{
 63 |		vertexCount += isVertexInside(gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz);
 64 |	}
 65 |	mat4 projviewMatrix = projMatrix * viewMatrix;
 66 |    if (vertexCount==3&&quadrFlag)
 67 |    {
 68 |		vec3 CameraRight = vec3(viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]);
 69 |		vec3 CameraUp = vec3(viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]);
 70 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
 71 |		{
 72 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
 73 |
 74 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
 75 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 76 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 77 |			EmitVertex();
 78 |
 79 |			Pos += CameraUp*dist;
 80 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 81 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
 82 |			EmitVertex();
 83 |
 84 |			Pos -= CameraUp*dist;
 85 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
 86 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 87 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 88 |			EmitVertex();
 89 |
 90 |			Pos += CameraUp*dist;
 91 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
 92 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 93 |			EmitVertex();
 94 |
 95 |			EndPrimitive();
 96 |		}
 97 |	}
 98 |	    if (vertexCount==3&&!quadrFlag)
 99 |    {
100 |		vec3 CameraRight = vec3(viewMatrix[0][0], viewMatrix[1][0], viewMatrix[2][0]);
101 |		vec3 CameraUp = vec3(viewMatrix[0][1], viewMatrix[1][1], viewMatrix[2][1]);
102 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
103 |		{
104 |			vec3 Pos = gl_in[i].gl_Position.xyz;
105 |
106 |			Pos -= (CameraRight * (dist/2));
107 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
108 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
109 |			EmitVertex();
110 |
111 |			Pos += CameraUp*dist;
112 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
113 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
114 |			EmitVertex();
115 |
116 |			Pos -= CameraUp*dist;
117 |			Pos += (CameraRight * dist);
118 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
119 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(1.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
120 |			EmitVertex();
121 |
122 |			Pos += CameraUp*dist;
123 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * vec4(Pos, 1.0);
124 |			fragColor = color[i]*vec4(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
125 |			EmitVertex();
126 |
127 |			EndPrimitive();
128 |		}
129 |	}
130 |	if (0<=vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
131 |	{
132 |		for (int i = 0; i < gl_in.length(); i++)
133 |		{
134 |			vec4 colorMask = vec4(1.0f);
135 |			gl_Position = projviewMatrix * gl_in[i].gl_Position;
136 |			if (0<vertexCount&&vertexCount<3)
137 |			{
138 |				colorMask.xyz = vec3(0.0f);
139 |				colorMask[2-vertexCount]=1.0f;
140 |			}
141 |			fragColor = color[i]*colorMask;
142 |			EmitVertex();
143 |		}
144 |		EndPrimitive();
145 |	}
146 |}
